full_summary:
# Title and Summary
**Dental Care Services Tender Notification**
The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking bids for dental care services at the Cowansville Institution in Quebec. This tender is for a one-year period with the option to renew for two additional years.

## Project Overview
The Correctional Service of Canada's Health Services requires dental services for the inmates at the Cowansville Institution, located in Quebec. The objective is to provide essential dental care services to the inmates.

## Deliverables
The contractor must:
* Provide procedure information to the Chief Health Services once a month
* Produce or contribute to regional reporting as requested by the Chief Health Services

## Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: CB-491-88435165
* **Publication Date**: October 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 16, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: October 15, 2024 (with the option to renew for two additional years)

## Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the lowest-priced compliant bid.

## Eligibility and Conditions
All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The contract includes security requirements.

## Supporting Documents
The solicitation document and evaluation criteria can be downloaded from the Canada Buys/Tender Opportunities website. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

## Contact Information
Isabelle Levesque
Contact Name: Isabelle Levesque
Contact Email: [isabelle.levesque@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:isabelle.levesque@csc-scc.gc.ca)
Contact Phone: (343) 574-3514
**Note**: This is a competitive tender and the Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers. Suppliers are encouraged to review the terms and conditions of the tender carefully.  <hr/>
